definitions.definition: An indirect or deceptive device or stratagem ; a blind . Refers especially to war and diplomatics.
examples: Overt subterfuge in a region nearly caused a minor accident.

definitions.definition: Deception ; misrepresentation of the true nature of an activity.

main_definition: ( countable ) An indirect or deceptive device or stratagem ; a blind . Refers especially to war and diplomatics.
secondary_definitions: ( uncountable ) Deception ; misrepresentation of the true nature of an activity.
